scan_metadata.description: lambda - Compliance Functions Mapping - OPTIMIZED VERSION
scan_metadata.optimization_notes: Intelligently categorized functions by cloud security expert analysis, grouped by service, simplified to 4 clear categories with execution types and remediation effort classification

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check Lambda Insights enabled
check_functions.description: Checks if Lambda Insights monitoring is enabled

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check Secrets Manager integration
check_functions.description: Checks if Lambda integrates with Secrets Manager

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check least privilege policy
check_functions.description: Checks if Lambda function uses least privilege policy

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check IAM role
check_functions.description: Checks IAM role assigned to Lambda function

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check active execution role
check_functions.description: Checks if Lambda function has active execution role

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check code signing enabled
check_functions.description: Checks if code signing is enabled for Lambda function

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check admin privileges
check_functions.description: Checks if Lambda function has no admin privileges

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check cross-account access
check_functions.description: Checks if Lambda function allows cross-account access

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check runtime end of support
check_functions.description: Checks if Lambda function runtime is end of support

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check variables encryption in transit
check_functions.description: Checks if Lambda function variables are encrypted in transit

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check DynamoDB integration
check_functions.description: Checks if Lambda function integrates with DynamoDB

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check latest runtime version
check_functions.description: Checks if Lambda function uses latest runtime version

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check unused permissions
check_functions.description: Checks for unused permissions in Lambda function
